ComicInfo.Series: DCeased: A Good Day to Die
ComicInfo.Summary: A Good Day to Die: Mister Terrific teams with Mister Miracle, Big Barda, Blue Beetle, and Booster Gold to try to stop the spread of the zombie virus. When scientific means fail, Mister Terrific tries to get John Constantine to give magical help, but he refuses initially. When Terrific's plan to have Booster prevent the virus via time-travel fails, the heroes are overcome by zombies. Constantine returns to help the heroes but is too late.
